$opinion..validate: newData.hasChildren(['author', 'content', 'createdTime']) && newData.child('author').isNumber() && newData.child('author').val() > 0 && newData.child('author').val() < 3 && newData.child('content').isString() && newData.child('content').val().length > 4 && newData.child('createdTime').isNumber()
